page.title: 04Shopping in Tongue
page.content: The main shop is a small family business which includes a small super market, grage, petrol pumps, coal deliveries and calor gas supplies. There are three vans which are mobile shops to supply outlying areas with goods, and there are three lorries which fetch supplies from In verness , take cattle or sheep to markets, or do furniture removals. There are twelve employees in the business which makes it the biggest local employer. There used also to be a bakery but now wrapped sliced bread is brought in twice a week by van. The mobile shops provide a costly but necessary service to the many isolated crofts and houses in the area.
